treated for breast cancer in

examine you. Lumps which 
are not harmful often appear 
in pregnancy but it is best 
to have them checked by a

Ultrasound scans
Most	hospitals	will	offer	
women at least two ultrasound 
scans during their pregnancy. 
The	first	is	usually	around	eight	
to 12 weeks and is sometimes 
called the dating scan because 
it can help to determine when 
the baby is due. The second 
scan usually takes place 
between 18 and 20
